# BoostedTreeClassifier.Transformer

**Type Alias**

The transformer type created by this estimator.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Transformer = TreeClassifierModel<Label>
```

## Fitting the classifier

- **fitted(to:validateOn:eventHandler:)**: Fits a boosted tree classifier model to a collection of examples.
- **BoostedTreeClassifier.Annotation**: The annotation type.

items.description: Fits a boosted tree classifier model to a collection of examples.
items.name: fitted(to:validateOn:eventHandler:)
